concept.title: Upgrading Eclipse Plugins
concept.shortdesc: How to upgrade the eclipse plugins

section.title: Manually
section.p:
In case any new features have been added to the toolkit, it is best to use the install new software option, which will pick up new features and upgrade existing ones at the same time.
Help Install New Software
The work with URL is http://www.docfacto.com/eclipse/4.2

section.title: Automatic
section.p:
To enable automatic updates, this feature will need to be enabled within Eclipse. The feature can be found in Preferences
Eclipse Preferences Install / Update Automatic Updates
